value.name: Eleanor Bumpurs, Deborah Danner, and Finally Fixing Our Emergency Response

value.name: NYC To Pay Family Of Deborah Danner $2 Million Settlement
value.description: The city will pay the family $2 million after Danner, 66, was fatally shot by a police officer in the bedroom of her Bronx apartment in 2016. CBS2's Mary Calvi reports.

value.name: The Public Space: Confrontations and Controls

value.name: Chauvin's guilty verdict is a major milestone in America's reckoning with racial justice
value.description: It has been a year of historic antiracism protests unlike anything seen in this country for decades, but Derek Chauvin’s conviction on all three counts gave many Americans some hope that the past need not repeat itself.

value.name: Chauvin's guilty verdict is a major milestone in America's reckoning with racial justice
